name: Sneak Attack
trigger: once per turn when you hit with a Finesse or Ranged weapon attack
effects: deal extra damage equal to your Sneak Attack dice if you have advantage on the attack roll
you can also deal Sneak Attack if an ally is within 5 feet of the target, the ally is not incapacitated, and you do not have disadvantage
the extra damage is the same type as the weapon and scales by Rogue level
